EmailTemplate.subject: Your QuikTrip Fleetmaster Account has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! Your QuikTrip Fleetmaster account has been approved.
As the next step, please take a few moments to complete the attached form, following the steps below:
Recommended Program Setup:
Drivers IDs (or PIN #s) are linked to employees/drivers Fuel Cards are linked to vehicles Any driver can use his/her Driver ID number on any card on your account
Information needed on the Fleet Card Information Form:
Please choose ONE field that you would like to have appear on the second line of your card, beneath your company name Vehicle description or License plate number or Unit number Leave the rest of the fields on the bottom portion of the form blank
Driver Information:
Please provide a list of your driver names along with a separate four- or six-digit Driver ID number for each driver. If you prefer for us to assign the Driver ID number(s), just leave that section blank.
Please either scan/email the completed form to me at the email address noted below or fax it to {!User.Fax} at your earliest convenience.
Once I receive this information, I will be in touch to review the account set-up with you before issuing your cards.
If you need help filling out the form, please watch our 5 minute informational video. http://www.wexcard.com/tutorial
Feel free to give me a call if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
